data.title: Ozark AL funeral home and cremation
data.meta_description: All Obituaries - Newman Mortuary, Inc. offers a variety of funeral services, from traditional funerals to competitively priced cremations, serving Ozark, AL and the surrounding communities. We also offer funeral pre-planning and carry a wide selection of caskets, vaults, urns and burial containers.
